We perform work based on customer drawings or, if necessary, develop design and technical documentation from scratch. The finished products are shipped throughout Ukraine and abroad. We have experience working with foreign companies.

shlifovkaMetaluPage.title: Metal Grinding
shlifovkaMetaluPage.description: Metal grinding is one of the key areas of activity for QPart. We provide metalworking services throughout Ukraine, taking on complex tasks and adhering to the highest quality standards. If you need metal grinding services in Dnipro, our company will deliver them at the highest level and in the shortest time.

termichnaObrobkaPage.title: HEAT TREATMENT
termichnaObrobkaPage.description: Heat treatment of metal by QPart: hardening, annealing, and tempering

frezerniRoboty.title: CNC Milling by QPart: Precision, Quality, Professionalism
frezerniRoboty.description: CNC milling is a modern method of metal machining that allows the production of parts with complex geometric parameters and high operational characteristics. This technology is applicable for working with various materials: titanium, aluminum, cast iron, stainless steel, and other metals.

tokarniRobotyChpkPage.title: CNC Turning: Precision, Quality, Reliability
tokarniRobotyChpkPage.description: CNC turning is a modern metal machining technology that allows the production of parts with high precision and specified parameters. This method is ideal for creating both simple and complex products made from stainless steel, aluminum, brass, cast iron, and other materials.

listPeculiarities.description: Precision and stability. CNC machines provide processing with minimal deviations from the specified dimensions.
Execution speed. Due to process automation, high productivity is achieved even with large volumes of work.
Flexibility in working with materials. The technology is suitable for processing hard alloys, stainless steel, aluminum, and other metals.
Surface quality. Thanks to precise cutting tools, finished products have a smooth, neat surface that meets the specified roughness.

porizkaNaVerstati.title: Cutting on a Bandsaw: Efficiency and Precision
porizkaNaVerstati.description: Cutting on a bandsaw is a modern and reliable method of material processing that ensures high quality and precision of finished parts. Thanks to advanced technologies, this method is optimal for producing parts of any complexity.

indyvidualniZamovlennya.title: Custom Metal Products: Quality and Timeliness
indyvidualniZamovlennya.description: Manufacturing metal products is a modern approach to meeting the needs for parts of any complexity. This service allows the client to avoid costs associated with purchasing equipment, training personnel, and organizing the production process. Thanks to advanced technologies, QPart manufactures custom metal products in accordance with the highest quality standards. We work with steel, aluminum, brass, cast iron, stainless steel, and other metals, ensuring precise execution of technical tasks.

lazernaRizkaPage.title: Laser Metal Cutting
lazernaRizkaPage.description: Laser cutting is a modern method of processing and cutting sheet metal using high-precision equipment with CNC (computer numerical control). Each order is processed individually: before starting, the machine is programmed considering all technical requirements, ensuring perfect accuracy and the ability to work with materials of any complexity.

listServices.description: Laser perforation of sheet metal - ideal for creating holes of various shapes and sizes with high precision.
Laser cutting of pipes and profiles - allows for precise processing of complex-shaped metal structures.

listAdvantages.title: Capable of handling large volumes – ensuring uninterrupted work even for large-scale orders.
More than 300 CNC machines – modern equipment guarantees precision, quality, and speed of execution.
Flexible deadlines – we work quickly and always on time!

lazernaRizkaPage.descriptionBenefits: Advantages of laser cutting: The principle of this technology is based on the heat impact of a laser beam. During processing, the material is heated to the melting point, ensuring minimal error and high cutting quality.

listPeculiarities.description: Capability to work with various materials: stainless steel, aluminum, copper, brass, and others, including non-ferrous metals.
Perfectly smooth edges without the need for additional processing.
Minimization of material waste thanks to high precision.
No metal deformation and preservation of its original properties.

lazernaRizkaPage.descriptionDifferences: Unlike traditional mechanical cutting methods, laser processing guarantees quality and cost-effectiveness in manufacturing parts of any complexity.
